profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences.
profile.display_name_desc: This is your public display name.
profile.delete_account_warning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
profile.security_desc: Manage your password and security questions.
profile.current_password_desc: Enter your current password to verify your identity.
profile.password_desc: Password must be at least 8 characters.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.desc: Customize the look and feel of the application.
appearance.respect_filters_desc: Apply actions (Export, Copy) only to the currently filtered data.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.desc: Configure how you want to be notified.
notifications.weekly_digest_desc: Receive a weekly summary of schedule changes.

automation.title: Automation
automation.auto_save_desc: Automatically save changes to local storage.
automation.clear_schedule_on_load_desc: Replace existing schedules when loading a new file.

storage.title: Storage & Export
storage.desc: Manage where and how your files are saved.
storage.open_after_export_desc: Automatically open the file after exporting.
storage.quick_export_desc: Skip file dialog and save directly to default path.
storage.quick_export_warning: Export Path must be set to a folder within Downloads, Documents, or Desktop for this to work.

system.title: System
system.desc: View version details, manage local data cache, and perform maintenance tasks.
system.clear_cache_modal_desc: This will delete all saved schedules and reset your settings to defaults. This action cannot be undone.
system.software_update_desc: Check for the latest version of Minerva.
